name: Something's Changed (Minsk 2118)
description:
Ludum Dare 47 Theme: Stuck in a Loop Entry

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/somethings-changed-minsk-2118

Kinda went it's own way I guess - probably super tired from 3 day non stop making it
Cooler when playing to the rhytm
Also follow Yellow and Red Outlines to not get super lost

I strongly encourage you to play PC version (runs way smoother)

Controls:

WASD to move
LMB to interact
SPACE to jump
